00034 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00035 BdkPdfGaussPolyn::BdkPdfGaussPolyn() : _fracGauss(0) {
00036   // Default Constructor:
00037   addComponents();
00038 }
00039 
00040 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00041 BdkPdfGaussPolyn::BdkPdfGaussPolyn(const char * theName,
00042                                    const char * theDesc,
00043                                    RooRealVar & dependent,
00044                                    Int_t lowestOrder,
00045                                    Int_t highestOrder)  : _fracGauss(0) {
00046   // Initializing Constructor:
00047   addComponents();
00048   init(theName, theDesc, dependent,
00049        lowestOrder, highestOrder);
00050 }
00051 
00052 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00053 BdkPdfGaussPolyn::~BdkPdfGaussPolyn() {
00054   // Destructor:
00055   deleteFrac();
00056 }

00060 // Dummy copy constructor:
00061     cout << "BdkPdfGaussPolyn::BdkPdfGaussPolyn -- dummy copy constructor"
00062          << endl;

00066 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00067 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::init(const char * theName,
00068                             const char * theDesc,
00069                             RooRealVar & dependent,
00070                             Int_t lowestOrder,
00071                             Int_t highestOrder) {
00072   // Initializer:
00073   _fracGauss = 0;
00074 
00075   SetName(theName);
00076   SetTitle(theDesc);
00077 
00078   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00079   setDependent(dependent);
00080 
00081   _lowestOrder = lowestOrder;
00082   _highestOrder = highestOrder;
00083   initParameters();
00084 }
00085 
00086 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00088   // Sets the dependent variable:
00089   _dependent = &dependent;
00090   _gauss.setDependent(dependent);
00091   _polyn.setDependent(dependent);
00092 
00093   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00094 }
00095 
00096 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::initParameters() {
00098   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00099   _fracGauss = new RooRealVar(GetName() + TString(".fracGauss"),
00100                               GetTitle () + TString(" fracGauss"),
00101                               0.5, 0, 1);
00102 
00103   _fracGauss->setError(0.01);
00104 
00105   _gauss.init(GetName() + TString(".gauss"), 
00106               GetTitle() + TString(" Gauss"), 
00107               *_dependent);
00108 
00109   _polyn.init(GetName() + TString(".polyn"), 
00110               GetTitle() + TString(" Polyn"), 
00111               *_dependent, _lowestOrder, 
00112               _highestOrder);
00113 }
00114 
00115 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00116 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::createPdf() {
00117   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00118   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00119                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00120                           *_gauss.getPdf(), 
00121                           *_polyn.getPdf(),
00122                           *_fracGauss);
00123 
00124   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00125 }
00126 
00127 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00128 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::deleteFrac() {
00129   // Deletes pointers:
00130   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00131   if ( _fracGauss != 0 )   delete _fracGauss;
00132 }
00133 
00134 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::addComponents() {
00136   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00137   addComponent(_gauss);
00138   addComponent(_polyn);
00139 }
00140 
00141 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00142 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::linkParameters(RooRealVar * mean,
00143                                       RooRealVar * sigma,
00144                                       Int_t lowestOrder,
00145                                       Int_t highestOrder,        
00146                                       RooRealVar * fracB) {
00147   // Copies RRV pointers:
00148   _gauss.linkResolution(mean, sigma);
00149   _polyn.linkParameters(lowestOrder, highestOrder);
00150 
00151   if (0 != fracB) {
00152     _fracGauss = fracB;
00153     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00154   }
00155 }
00156 
00157 //---------------------------------------------------
00158 void BdkPdfGaussPolyn::linkParameters( BdkPdfGaussPolyn & pdf2) {
00159         _gauss.linkResolution(pdf2.gauss());
00160         _polyn.linkParameters(pdf2.polyn());
00161         _fracGauss = pdf2.fracGauss();
00162 }
